page.title: 06THE STROOD WEST MERSEA.
page.content: The strood is a road.It is the only way on and off Mersea island.This road can get flooded by the estuary water so we have to have a tide timetable because we could get stuck on the island Sometimes,the tide gets quite high.Buses and lorries can get over quite easily.Quite a lot of people go water skiing in the Strood Channel beside the road.There are many superstitions about the Strood.One of which concerns a Roman centurion who was stationed on the island after the Roman invasion. It is said that his ghost walks the Strood at midnight after he suffered an untimely death.
